title: Elijah Taken to Heaven
summary: Elijah is taken to heaven in a whirlwind, and Elisha inherits his prophetic ministry. Elisha performs miracles to affirm his authority, including parting the Jordan River and healing bitter water in Jericho.

faq.question: How was Elijah taken to heaven?
faq.answer: In a whirlwind with a chariot and horses of fire.

faq.question: What was Elisha’s first miracle after receiving Elijah’s spirit?
faq.answer: He parted the Jordan River using Elijah’s cloak.
